description: This API allows you to consult the status of a previously requested batch download for FTIS tax documents.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration to successful request for all regions

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the app. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopper's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: A list of integers representing the request IDs to be queried

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if not zero. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: error_msg
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened

children.name: request_id
children.description: Represents the current status of the request

children.name: file_name
children.description: Name of the file to be downloaded

children.name: status
children.description: Represents the current status of the request
